page.title: 12THE HAMLETS
page.content: {BOCOMBE,}In BOCOMBE there are two farms and one cottage: Population:_ thirteen people. {BROAD PARKHAM,}In BROAD PARKHAM there are three farms and four houses: Population:_ nine people. {NEWHAVEN,}In NEWHAVEN there are three houses:_ Population:_ eleven people. {GOLDWORTHY,}In GOLDWORTHY there are three houses, two farms and a converted chapel. Population:_ seventeen {PARKHAM ASH,}There are four farms and ten houses in Parkham Ash. Population:_ thirty five {NETHERCOTT,}The one house is owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marsh. Population:_ four
